Material used.Description: Cell culture studies were conducted to assess mitochondrial localization and protective effects.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Loss of mitochondrial localization, increased stress susceptibility
Readout description.Result Description: Mutations led to impaired mitochondrial function and higher cellular stress.
Missense mutation reduced the protective capacity against cellular stress.

Biological replicates.Description: Number of biological replicates not specified.

Technical replicates.Description: Number of technical replicates not specified.

Basic positive control.Description: Positive controls not detailed in the context.

Basic negative control.Description: Negative controls not detailed in the context.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal mitochondrial localization and protective effects observed in wild-type cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Abnormal results indicated by impaired mitochondrial function and increased stress susceptibility.
